name: viero-cdn-passthrough
description: CDN server for public viero content.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && babel src -d ./dist --source-maps inline
scripts.build:nolint: npm run clean && babel src -d ./dist --source-maps inline
scripts.dist: npm run build && copyfiles package.json README.md LICENSE.md dist
scripts.dist:nolint: npm run build:nolint && copyfiles package.json README.md LICENSE.md dist
scripts.npmjs: npm run dist && npm publish ./dist --access public
